attributes.name: Corrupted Bear Heart
attributes.description: The heart of a Corrupted Bear.
attributes.parsed_description: The heart of a Corrupted Bear.

attributes.name: Corrupted Binding Claw
attributes.description: A huge claw covered in deep and bright etchings. Holding it seems to attract Corruption.
attributes.parsed_description: A huge claw covered in deep and bright etchings. Holding it seems to attract Corruption.

attributes.name: Corrupted Bindings
attributes.description: Corruption-infused silks taken from the body of a Legatus General.
attributes.parsed_description: Corruption-infused silks taken from the body of a Legatus General.

attributes.name: Corrupted Blood
attributes.description: The blade will know the taste of its enemies, and will grow ever hungrier for more.
attributes.parsed_description: The blade will know the taste of its enemies, and will grow ever hungrier for more.

attributes.name: Corrupted Collar
attributes.description: Used to keep Corrupted animals under control.
attributes.parsed_description: Used to keep Corrupted animals under control.

attributes.name: Corrupted Collar
attributes.description: A control collar used to chain up prisoners.
attributes.parsed_description: A control collar used to chain up prisoners.

attributes.name: Corrupted Commander's Insignia
attributes.description: A rank insignia belonging to a Commander in the Corrupted Army.
attributes.parsed_description: A rank insignia belonging to a Commander in the Corrupted Army.

attributes.name: Corrupted Compass
attributes.description: This compass's needle seems to move with some dark energy that is certainly not magnetism.
attributes.parsed_description: This compass's needle seems to move with some dark energy that is certainly not magnetism.

attributes.name: Corrupted Core
attributes.description: A crystal that is somehow imbued with Corruption.
attributes.parsed_description: A crystal that is somehow imbued with Corruption.

attributes.name: Corrupted Crest
attributes.description: A symbol formerly possessed by the Corrupted. Improve your Corrupted Bane trophy with this.
attributes.parsed_description: A symbol formerly possessed by the Corrupted. Improve your Corrupted Bane trophy with this.

attributes.name: Corrupted Crystal
attributes.description: A crystal of corrupt energy that can be found at a corruption event. Use Stonemasonry to combine corrupted crystals to make a corrupted lodestone.
attributes.parsed_description: A crystal of corrupt energy that can be found at a corruption event. Use Stonemasonry to combine corrupted crystals to make a corrupted lodestone.

attributes.name: Corrupted Equipment Cache (Level: 1)
attributes.description: Open this container to get items usable at or around the indicated level. Containers are not affected by Luck.
attributes.parsed_description: Open this container to get items usable at or around the indicated level. Containers are not affected by Luck.
